title: Council of Water Utilities San Diego County's Tweets - Twitter
body: Council of Water Utilities San Diego County. @COWUSanDiego. Â·. Feb 13, 2020. Come join us next Tuesday, Feb. 18th to learn how ag is using innovative technology to reduce water use. Our speaker is Hank Rupp, COO of Rancho Guejito, a 23,000 acre ranch in north county.
